item.description:
The First Annual Salem Games Group, Great Chili Cookoff! Bring your favorite chili, already prepared (crockpot, pan or microwavable container), WITH the appropriate garnishes, enough for 4-6 people. Those not wishing to cook, may be the judges, or provide the paper products/beverages. Please, designate in your RSVP! 

Note: We don't want anyone to go hungry so, for those with special dietary concerns or preferences, you may want to bring the food of your choice. 

Games to follow! 
Please meet at the front door of The Essex condo
(11 Church St, Salem - across from what some folks call "the Almy's parking lot" - you'll see the green awning) and then I will take everyone downstairs to the Essex Room. Those who arrive later will need to call me to get in (978-219-9292). The number/directions will be posted on the front door.
Please bring your favorite games to play. I have a few (Anomia, Luck of the Draw, Fluxx, Uno, Cribbage, Yahtzee, and several decks of cards).

group.name: The Salem Board Games Meetup Group

item.name: Games and Chili at the Essex - Our First Great Chili Cook-off
